titles.title: To make technical corrections to the Guam World War II Claims Fund.
To make technical corrections to the Guam World War II Claims Fund.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

term.name: War crimes, genocide, crimes against humanity

bill.summary: This bill provides appropriations for the Guam World War II Claims Fund. The fund is used to pay claims of the victims and survivors of the attack and occupation of Guam by Imperial Japanese military forces during World War II and the liberation of Guam by U.S. military forces.
